articles.title: Asian Traders Cautious on Tech, Shutdown Concerns: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Stocks climbed, while bonds and the yen weakened, as hopes for a deal to end the longest US government shutdown lifted risk sentiment after a volatile week in which investors grappled with concerns over lofty AI valuations.

articles.title: Apple reportedly plans ambitious satellite-powered iPhone features - TechCrunch
articles.description: While Apple’s iPhone already supports texting, calling emergency services, and contacting roadside assistance via satellite connectivity, the company may have many more satellite-powered features in the works.
